resources.string: Your introductory source to the group BTS (aka Beyond The Scene, Bangtan Boys, Bangtan Sonyeondan, and Bulletproof Boyscouts - yes, they\'re known by a lot of names). Debuting in 2013 and consisting of 7-members, these lovable guys sing songs that represent today\'s youth - in Korean and internationally.
Click the image to find out more about them and to hear some of their solo songs.
